CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 11, 1962, pg. 14, reads: "Top Fund-Raiser - Mrs. Alma Chandler, president of the Courtesy Club, is seen accepting a trophy from the Rev. H.W. McCreary, pastor of John Wesley AME Zion Church, Pittsburgh. Left to right: Lucy Hunter, Elinor Reed, Mattie Robinson, the Rev. Davie Gibson Chandler, Odessa Pugh, Nina Wade, Inez Thompson and Mary Cherry. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alma Chandler accepting trophy from Rev. H. W. McCreary, with Courtesy Club members, from left: Lucy Hunter, Elinor Reed, Mattie Robinson, Rev. Davie Gibson Chandler, Odessa Pugh, Nina Wade, Inez Thompson, and Mary Cherry looking on, standing behind banquet table in John Wesley AME Zion Church
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Clergy--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trophies--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.John Wesley African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Chandler, Alma.
